name: World Internet Projects
tag_list: free-to-play, social-gaming-platform, social-network, facebook-connect, multiplayer-games, online-games, mmo-games, internet-games, share-on-facebook, facebook-events, online-community, mmo, free-multiplayer-games, free-games, play-free-games, play-online
overview:
World Internet Projects is a company that specializes in the development and distribution of massive online casual games.

With 4 offices in Barcelona, Chile and Uruguay, we differentiate ourselves with a unique approach on the development of online casual games, communities and social game platforms, improving brand awareness with the White label Solutions, some of the many features we have to offer.

After the huge success of the online social multiplayer platform FR9.es in the Spanish gaming world, FR9 now premieres with www.fr9.com, increasing engagement even more by connecting players with each other through an online multiplayer community where they can play, chat, compete and win amazing prizes every month.

Social sharing forms a large part of our focus, with users being able to share achievements and rewards and stay connected with a game platform that is fully integrated with Facebook Connect.
